column4: Is there a way to enable Dual Boot with windas AFTER you have installet ubuntu? If not, can I uninstall/install it again to do so?
if you use the alternate cd then i think you can escape the automated process somehow and manually select write grub
No, Im using the desktop CD
i think you can mount your / patition under the live cd and update-grub from there though others might have more knowledge about that than myself i've never done it before
